entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming south 30 after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with a few flurries. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 then increasing to 50 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
